definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: Procedures and processes, in the next track slowly chewing.
sentences.chinese: 程序與過程，在往後的行跡中慢慢咀嚼。

sentences.english: He has been hiding his whereabouts very well.
sentences.chinese: 他一直將自己的行跡掩藏得很好。

sentences.english: A suspicious boat made up to us.
sentences.chinese: 一艘行跡可疑的船向我們駛來。

sentences.english: Preaching of self-contempt, eternalised in guilt. In words and deed, a man's high treason.
sentences.chinese: 這自卑的辯辭，不朽的罪悔，他那叛棄的言語和行跡。

definition: dangers spring up all around (idiom); surrounded by perils
(of a plot etc) to fall through and stand exposed
the ways of the world/social behavior
